CSS Classes

Flex Box Tutorial

Visit a Complete Guide to Flexbox to learn how the CSS3 Flexible Box Layout works.

Scroll Spy

The Bootstrap Scrollspy component will not work because it assumes the page as a whole is scrolling. However, you can provide similar functionality for your own scrolling regions using a small amount of JavaScript. The documentation sidebar demonstrates a simple implementation, which you can use as a starting point.
